segments.text: He's a year older than Keith , but he looks younger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's fine . He retired last week . It's a turning point in his life . Now he can relax and enjoy his retirement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He can spend more time with his grandchildren .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I don't think he wants to . He wants to travel to several different countries around the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , he wants to have a more active retirement . Good idea !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you want to spend your old age ?
segments.speaker: S1
